content.question: Dr. Obetz is conducting an experimental study on the effectiveness of antianxiety medication. Which of the following will most likely be her independent variable?

choices.label: Age of first symptoms, because she will randomly divide her participants into groups, assigning them based on the age that symptoms first appeared.
Frequency of hallucinations, because she will measure the frequency of hallucinations that her participants have with each type of medication.
Type of medication, because she will randomly divide participants into groups and give the groups different types of medication.
Severity of anxiety, because she will measure the amount of self-reported anxiety that is present in her participants with each type of medication.

content.answer: Type of medication, because she will randomly divide participants into groups and give the groups different types of medication.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
